title: Tsuki no Yoru
description:
14 pages short story which originally appeared in AERA COMIC'S "Nippon no Manga" anthology.

To get anything other than the pretty pictures out of this short story, one should have read [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanshiro_(novel)]Natsume Souseki's Sanshiro[/url].

matches.title: Hagio Moto's Age of The Beatles Illustrated Essay
Kantai Collection - Battleship Above the Hill (Doujinshi)
